alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Susquehanna and northeastern Bradford Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Litchfield, or near Athens, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sayre, Athens, Sheshequin, Ulster, Litchfield, Orwell, Windham, Herrick, Rome and Le Raysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
